change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: University of Arizona. Student Body Organization.

did.abstract: The Students Association created in 1904 was changed to the Student Body Organization in 1914. The organization name was changed again in 1931, when it became the Associated Students of The University of Arizona. The collection includes a typescript (carbon). Holograph signatures of approval: C.R. Stewart, Business Manager; A.H. Wilde, president of The University of Arizona; A.E. Douglas, secretary of the Faculty; I. Rolph, secretary of the Student Body.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Student Body Organization Constitution (AZ 355). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: The Students Association created in 1904 was changed to the Student Body Organization in 1914. The organization name was changed again in 1931, when it became the Associated Students of The University of Arizona.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Typescript (carbon). Holograph signatures of approval: C.R. Stewart, Business Manager; A.H. Wilde, president of The University of Arizona; A.E. Douglas, secretary of the Faculty; I. Rolph, secretary of the Student Body.
